property.name: mapreduce.framework.name
property.description: Execution framework set to Hadoop YARN.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.address
property.description: 配置 MapReduce JobHistory Server 地址 ，默认端口10020 MapReduce JobHistory Server host:port. Default port is 10020.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.webapp.address
property.description: 配置 MapReduce JobHistory Server web ui 地址， 默认端口19888 MapReduce JobHistory Server Web UI host:port. Default port is 19888.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.intermediate-done-dir
property.description: MapReduce作业产生的日志存放位置 Directory where history files are written by MapReduce jobs.

property.name: mapreduce.jobhistory.done-dir
property.description: MR JobHistory Server管理的日志的存放位置 Directory where history files are managed by the MR JobHistory Server.
